= User Stories =
  * User can see vanderbilt campus
  * User can see all paths on vanderbilt campus
  * User can zoom in and out on campus map
  * User can pan on campus map
  * User can see a list of buildings
  * User can see current location if user has GPS
  * User can find shortest path between two points on map
